title: Welcome to PSTAT197A/CMPSC190DD
text: Most students take this course to prepare for their work on sponsored team projects during the remainder of the capstone sequence (PSTAT197B-C/CMPSC190DE-DF). However, some may elect to take the course for other reasons, such as an upcoming faculty-supervised research project or internship.

title: Technology
text:
R version 4.2.0+
RStudio version 2022.07.1+554
Git version 2.36.1+
A visual GitHub client such as GitKracken.

Installations and basic functionality will be covered in the first lab session.
While PSTAT197A is not strictly language-agnostic, it is also not a course especially emphasizing programming techniques in R. Students are therefore free to use other software at their discretion, provided it does not interfere with their participation in the class.

title: Course staff
text:
